name: Muppy The Bunny : The Danger of Wishes
detailed_description: Muppy The Bunny : The Danger of Wishes is a 2D platforming game inspired by many early platformers 90's. There is a bunch to do in this game, like running from a giant cat, flying a plane, using a parachute, swimming, driving a mine-cart. The game is set in a world before earth's history(as we know it) even started when the first war ever happened. Play as Muppy and fight his brother, Dark and his minions while collecting 41 wish orbs to save the world. And a special thanks to Noah B. Wilson for letting me use his music.
about_the_game: Muppy The Bunny : The Danger of Wishes is a 2D platforming game inspired by many early platformers 90's. There is a bunch to do in this game, like running from a giant cat, flying a plane, using a parachute, swimming, driving a mine-cart. The game is set in a world before earth's history(as we know it) even started when the first war ever happened. Play as Muppy and fight his brother, Dark and his minions while collecting 41 wish orbs to save the world. And a special thanks to Noah B. Wilson for letting me use his music.
short_description: Muppy The Bunny : The Danger of Wishes is a 2D platforming game inspired by many early platformers from the 90's. There is a bunch to do in this game, like running from a giant cat, flying a plane, using a parachute, swimming, driving a mine-cart, and so much more.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Any should do
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any graphics card
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any should do here too.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 Gen. 8
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any sound card
